description: I'm currently working in warehousing and logistics. I enjoy both application and web development, where I strive to solve dynamic problems using a wide range of technologies from Javascript, C# and BASIC to LLMs and Cloud solutions. I having working knowledge in a variety of databases and I'm currently working on my AWS Solutions Architect certification.
detailOrQuote: As I expand and refine my technical acumen, I look forward to further enlightenment as it relates to solving problems both new and old. I love a good challenge and thoroughly enjoy improving life-quality with technology.
